abstract: In a move that further signals its intention to go public, social-gaming site Zynga has hired Allen & Co. investment banker David Wehner as its new chief financial officer.
snippet: In a move that further signals its intention to go public, social-gaming site Zynga has hired Allen & Co. investment banker David Wehner as its new chief financial officer.
lead_paragraph: In a move that further signals its intention to go public, the social-gaming site, Zynga,  has hired an Allen & Company  investment banker, David Wehner, as its new chief financial officer.

headline.main: With C.F.O. Hire, Zynga Looks Closer to I.P.O.
